text: Hey folks!! I build a web page in nextjs, can you suggest the best possible way to convert it in hubl?

So I'm trying to make a custom email template with two drag and drop areas in it and it seems like that's not possible? I have one {% dnd_area %} already coded into the template and that works fine, but if I try to add another I get an error saying
`Error:Dnd area can only have name 'main'`

And if I try to have both areas with the name 'main' I get...
`Error:dnd_area tag with name 'main' must be unique in the template`
So this basically is telling me that you can only have one {% dnd_area %} per template

why does hs put cms docs in the cms guides section? example, <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/guides/cms/content/templates/overview|templates docs> should be in the<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/reference/cms/overview| cms reference,> no?

Hey buddy, good question. Had a great chat with <@U06832ZTGKC> on similar docs topics before christmas...

You might want to throw this question into <#C06S581J2AZ|developer-docs-beta> :slightly_smiling_face:

100% agree
The structure is so confusing :melting_face:
